headline.main: The Split Over Diet and Health

byline.original: By PATRICIA WELLS Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: article on controversy over Sen Nutrition Com revised rept on dietary goals of US; some nutritionists comment (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: WILLIAMSBURG, Va., Jan. 31--Despite decades and dollars spent in searching out the relationship between diet and health, the American scientific community remains divided over the issue.
docs.snippet: WILLIAMSBURG, Va., Jan. 31--Despite decades and dollars spent in searching out the relationship between diet and health, the American scientific community remains divided over the issue.
